DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Providers : Providers must employ Infants Toddlers Program ; Serve least one eligible child ASD Inclusion Criteria Families/Children : Children must 12 month , 0 day 35 month , 30 day age entry study ; Children must meet criterion Autism Diagnostic Observation Schedule ( ADOS ) ASD autism ; Caregiver child must available assessment Exclusion Criteria Families/Children : Children exclude foster care ward state Caregiver must fluent speak understanding English language
